products.productdescription: Verdi (blackout) sahara sand takes its inspiration from the endless expanse of desert that allows your mind to wander. The calming colour is perfect for setting your mind at ease, whilst the authenticity of the curves means you can add that regal touch you've been searching for.Pairing sahara sand with a variety of patterned wall papers and rugs is a great way to breathe new life into the living room. It's all about celebrating living the luxury life, so take your time to find pieces that you love. Good enough just won't do here.
